alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cheyenne and southwestern Morrill Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 319 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Court House And Jail Rocks, or 32 miles north of Sidney, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Dalton, Gurley, Court House And Jail Rocks and The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
